system.availability: Provides +10 to Research Tests involving Ciphers (Occult), Scholastic Lore (Legend), and Forbidden Lore (Cults, Daemonology, Warp, and/or Xenos). A Small Black Data-Slate made of durable materials that opens like a clasped book. Contains audio, pict recordings, and playback.  Usually personally encrypted, genelocked, and set to explode if opened by those not authorised.
system.cost: Ordo Xenos only. Considered Heretical by some
